greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1)=1, a(n) = a(n-phi(n)) + 1.
link: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n=1..10000
formula: It seems that for n large enough: log(n) < (1/n)*sum(k=1, n, a(k)) < log(n)+log(log(n)).
mathematica: Table[Length@ NestWhileList[# - EulerPhi@ # &, n, # > 0 &] - 1, {n, 105}] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Jul 04 2016 *)
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Oct 23 2002
